title: ISic000794. Funerary inscription for Kale

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text from autopsy

Italian translation

Norma Quagliana

Qui giace la presbitera KalÃ©, vissuta cinquant'anni irreprensibilmente. Ha completato la sua vita il diciannovesimo (giorno) prima delle calende di Ottobre [13 Settembre].

English translation

Norma Quagliana

Here lies the presbyter KalÃ©, who lived beyond reproach for fifty years. She completed her life the nineteenth (day) before the Kalends of October [13 September].

commentary

Manni Piraino describes the clear evidence of a previously erased text ('capovolgendo infatti il pezzo saranno chiaramente evidenti le tracce lasciate dallo scalpellino che erase almeno due righe di scrittura'); this presumably relates to the at times very regular pitting visible on the lower portion of the stone, but it is not immediately clear that these must relate to earlier letters, despite their arrangement, given the unusual technique that would be implied.

As Manni Piraino observes, the joining of the K and N in the abbreviation for ÎºÎ±Î»Î±Î½Î´á¿¶Î½, and the unusual form of the N in comparison to the rest of the text, suggests that this is rather a monogram forming multiple letters of the word.

bibliography

    26.1074 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796 1975.0454 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283 13 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000531 Fiorelli NSA 1878 175-176 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001392 Ferrua 1989 no.473 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995 Giuffrida 2020 60-61 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002323
